summary: CafeEnvironment was updated to rotate the four chairs so they face toward the table at [0,0,2] (front chairs z=1.3 rotation=0; back chairs z=2.7 rotation=Math.PI). The diff summary for BasicCafeRoomFallback is truncated before the table/chair placement, so there is insufficient evidence that the fallback environment chair rotations were updated to match.

missing_requirements.requirement: In BasicCafeRoomFallback, the chair rotations match the full environment so all four chairs face toward the table at [0, 0, 2].
